RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 84. Maiden Special Weight Purse 90000. (UP TO $15,660 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CAITLINHERGRTNESS showed early speed, was taken in hand briefly when MISCHIEVOUS MISS passed in front nearing the three-quarter pole then switched to the outside, moved up to make a bid with five furlongs to run, took the lead at the seven-sixteenths, controlled the action in the two path on the turn, dropped closer to the rail coming to the quarter-pole, responded well when set down in upper stretch and held under steady urging. BACKSTRETCH ROSE was last to commence, moved out while settling towards the rear, shifted from three to five wide on the turn, was roused late on that bend, advanced into upper stretch, pursued the winner into the final furlong, gained into the final sixteenth but missed. NIKITIS climbed some near the three-quarter pole, settled under some coaxing, was roused for more in the two path on the turn, raced between horses inside the three-eighths, pursued the winner under a drive in the stretch and was out-kicked. HELCIA was forwardly placed on the outside, chased three wide on the turn, was driven four wide into the stretch then moved further out under a drive and lacked the needed kick. KINGDOM COME moved out then settled on the outside, was asked in the four path on the turn, chased under a drive into the final furlong and came up empty. CLASSY MISCHIEF settled at the rear, moved from the rail to the two path on the turn, came three wide into upper stretch and was no factor. MISCHIEVOUS MISS moved to the front before leaving the chute then angled in coming to the three-quarter pole, showed the way down the backstretch, lost the lead while inside early on the turn, checked while dropping out of contention in the vicinity of the five-sixteenths and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Classy Mischief
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled at rear, ins-2path turn, 3path into upper, no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Backstretch Rose
ENTRY.OWNER: C and H Diamond Racing LLC Mims Ted O and Menard David
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away,moved out,settled,3-5w turn,chased,gained,missed

ENTRY.NAME: Nikitis
ENTRY.OWNER: Schermerhorn Richard Team Hanley and Thirty Year Farm
ENTRY.COMMENT: climbed 3/4, settled, roused 2path turn, chased, out-kicked

ENTRY.NAME: Kingdom Come
ENTRY.COMMENT: mvd out,settled outside,asked 4path turn,chased,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Caitlinhergrtness
ENTRY.OWNER: Siena Farm LLC and WinStar Farm LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed,in hand3/4,switch out,bid5/8,lead7/16,2p turn,rail1/4,held

ENTRY.NAME: Mischievous Miss
ENTRY.OWNER: Hidden Brook Farm and Denholtz Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: angled in 3/4,pace,headed7/16,ins,checked 5/16,stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Helcia
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed outside,urged1/2,3wide turn,4w1/4,mvd out,outkck

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 90. Claiming Purse 55000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Maiden And Claiming Races For $20,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BEAUTIFUL KAREN coaxed from the gate, prompted the pace four wide outside the top pair, swung three then two wide into upper stretch, dug in head to head taking command just inside the three-sixteenths, fought on with SUE ELLEN MISHKIN latched on to her inside, came in under a right handed crop to impede that rival just inside the sixteenth marker forcing that foe to check out along the rail and inched away in the late stages to prevail. ICY REPLY coaxed from the start, chased four wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled five wide for home, offered up a mild kick to secure the place honors. SUE ELLEN MISHKIN showed the way in hand along the inside under pressure from AWESOME INDRA and then a pair when joined by the top one, took the inside route into upper stretch, got headed for command just inside the three-sixteenths, fought on latched on to the inside of BEAUTIFUL KAREN and had that rival come in under a right handed crop a sixteenth out, got forced to check in tight along the rail when impeded and lost all momentum late getting shaken off and collared for the place honors while along for the show. AWESOME INDRA prompted the pace of the aforementioned foe from the outside two to three wide and then between foes when placed to coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch in the midst of being shaken off, then weakened in the late stages. TIMED OUT bobbled at the break getting away last and conceding four lengths to the front before settling into stride, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild bid, then was reported to have bled. BOWL OF CHERRIES coaxed from the gate, chased just off the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled four wide into upper stretch, weakened. MISS DOMINA hustled from the gate, grew eager pulling on the bit along the inside when off heels of SUE ELLEN MISHKIN early on, came under coaxing midway on the turn, swung three wide into upper stretch and weakened. DIVA BANKER coaxed from the gate, chased five wide under a ride from three furlongs out, swung six wide into upper stretch and made no impact. There was a Stewards' Inquiry into the stretch run focusing on BEAUTIFUL KAREN as well as a claim of foul by the rider of SUE ELLEN MISHKIN alleging interference against BEAUTIFUL KAREN. After review, the result was allowed to stand prior to the race being declared official.

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Domina
ENTRY.OWNER: R A Hill Stable and Reeves Thoroughbred Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, eager off heels ins early, 3w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Sue Ellen Mishkin
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand ins, inside 1/4, headed ins 3/16, checked, impeded 1/16p

ENTRY.NAME: Bowl of Cherries
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 2p, coaxed 3/8, angled 4w upper, weakened

ENTRY.OWNER: PlayingTheField Racing Final Turn Racing Stable LLC DelPo and The Boys Racing LL
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled st, chased 3-2w, coaxed 5/16, 4w upper, bid, bled

ENTRY.NAME: Awesome Indra
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted 2-3w, coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4p, dug in, weakened late.

ENTRY.NAME: Icy Reply
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 4w, coaxed 5/16, 5w upper, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Beautiful Karen
ENTRY.OWNER: Rodriguez Rudy R Imperio Michael and Scuderi Vincent S
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, prompt 4w, 3-2w uppr, up ins 3/16, impede foe ins 1/16

ENTRY.NAME: Diva Banker
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 5w, coaxed 3/8, 6w upper, no impact

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 89. Maiden Special Weight Purse 90000. OUTER TURF (UP TO $15,660 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). (Rail at 24 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: QUALITY CHIC prompted the pace on the outside of the leader, turned up the pressure in the four path on the turn, took over into upper stretch, shook clear under a right-handed crop into the final furlong then came inward before being switched to a left-handed crop and drew away under steady handling. MALIBU SPRINGS went to the front, showed the way under pressure to his outside, vied in the three path while urged along on the turn, lost the advantage into upper stretch, dropped back into the final furlong then moved out behind the winner and proved no match. WHENLOVETAKESOVER angled to the outside late in the chute, tossed his head under tight restraint while moving up alongside the other two foes nearing the three-quarter pole, stalked the pace on the outside, was given his cue in the five path on the turn, dropped back coming to the quarter-pole and came up empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Whenlovetakesover
ENTRY.COMMENT: angled out 6-1/2,tossed head,stlkd outside,ask 5p turn,chsd,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Malibu Springs
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace,ins foe,3path turn,headed3/16,no match

ENTRY.NAME: Quality Chic
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace,vied 4path turn,took over 3/16,drew away,driving

TRACK.NAME: Foreign track with Code of NEW

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 101. Allowance Purse 100000. (UP TO $17,400 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SET SAIL vied three wide early on among a quarter before settling three wide in closest aim of the leader, continued three wide through the turn and into upper stretch, rallied to take command near the eighth pole, then inched away to the finish getting geared down in the final jumps. FROMANOTHAMUTHA got bumped at the start by REGISTER, who stumbled and recovered inwards, chased just off the inside until tucked inside through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch, tipped out to the two then three path nearing the eighth pole to a clear lane and ran on to secure the place honors. ABADIN vied inside a trio early on before establishing sole command with five and a half furlongs to go, showed the way in hand along the inside got set down spinning just off the inside into upper stretch, dug in under threat and was collared near the eighth pole, kept on to preserve the show honors. LUNI SIMA chased four to five wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled five to six wide into upper stretch, weakened in the late stages. CERTIFIED LOVERBOY got brushed at the start by SUNDAESWITHSANDY, who broke outwards, vied briefly to the six furlong marker then chased five wide under coaxing from three furlongs out, swung four wide into upper stretch and weakened in the late stages. SUNDAESWITHSANDY broke out at the start brushing the aforementioned rival, came under coaxing and vied briefly between foes before giving chase four wide, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, cornered three to four wide at the head of the stretch and weakened. REGISTER stumbled at the start, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Abadin
ENTRY.OWNER: Three Diamonds Farm and Main Line Racing Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied early in, in hand ins, 2w 1/4p, collared 1/8, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Fromanothamutha
ENTRY.OWNER: Blue Lion Thoroughbreds Diamond T Racing Iapetus Racing Rinato Peter M and Handa
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, chased 2p, coaxed ins 5/16, ins 1/4, tip out, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Register
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled st, chased 3-2w, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Set Sail
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 3w early, chased 3w, 3w upper, up near 1/8, inched away

ENTRY.NAME: Sundaeswithsandy
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, coaxed st, vied briefly, chased 4w, 3-4w uppr, wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Certified Loverboy
ENTRY.OWNER: West Paces Racing LLC Twin Sports Racing Brown Road Racing Russell Ken and Adelp
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed st, chased 5w, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Luni Sima
ENTRY.OWNER: Walder Peter R and EKB Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 4-5w, coaxed 3/8, 5-6w upper, wknd late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 82. Maiden Special Weight Purse 90000. (UP TO $15,660 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile on the Main Track.) (Rail at 27 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MOONLIGHT veered out at the start, pressed the pace on the outside, turned up the pressure in the three path on the turn, took the lead into upper stretch, shook clear outside the furlong marker, drew away under urging into the final forty yards then was eased up while much the best. MALARCHUK was last away then bobbled after the start, established position just off the pace on the outside, was urged along late on the backstretch, chased in the four path on the turn and earned the place while no match for the winner. STOLEN MAGIC veered out at the start, went to the front, showed the way under pressure, vied in the two path while asked on the turn, lost the lead into upper stretch and tired. LIVE TO RIDE (GB) broke in at the start, settled off the pace, saved ground under urging on the turn and came up empty. ROCKET NIGHT broke in at the start, settled at the back, was urged along in the two path on the turn and was no factor. MARCEAU broke in at the start, moved to the outside leaving the chute, was urged four to five wide on the turn and capitulated. SKYLER'S ARTEMIS broke in at the start, was well placed towards the front, went three to four wide under urging on the turn and had nothing left. QUOKKA broke in at the start, prompted the pace on the inside, dropped back near the three-quarter pole, came up empty in the two path on the turn and faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Live to Ride (GB)
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in,settled,urged inside turn,came up empty

ENTRY.NAME: Rocket Night
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in,settled,urged 2path turn,failed to threaten

ENTRY.NAME: Quokka
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in,prmpt ins,drop back3/4,fell back 2p turn,faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Skyler's Artemis
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in,well placed,urged 3-4wide turn,empty

ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in,outside leaving chute,urged 4-5wide turn,empty

ENTRY.OWNER: Schermerhorn Richard Drown Jeffrey and Ryan Michael J

ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted outside,3path turn,lead3/16,drew away,eased up late

ENTRY.COMMENT: veered out start,pace,inside foe 2path turn,headed3/16,tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 99. Allowance Purse 100000. OUTER TURF (UP TO $17,400 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter Allowed 2 lbs. (Rail at 24 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DIGITIZE led early on five paths off the inside, then gave chase four then three wide in close aim of the leader, took back command near the quarter pole and was placed to light urging swinging three wide into upper stretch, lugged in straightened away at the three-sixteenths while edging clear and was back in hand inside the final furlong to prevail comfortably at the end. TWELTH MAN six paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked four wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled five wide into upper stretch, proved no match for the top one while running on to secure the place honors. FAMOUS GENT coaxed from the gate, chased briefly just off the inside before advancing to take over five furlongs from home, showed the way from the two path and then along the inside through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, yielded the front near the quarter pole and spun just off the inside into upper stretch, then weakened in the late stages. HIGHLY FLAMMABLE coaxed from the start, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, swung three wide for home and weakened. OCTOPUS chased five then four wide coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, angled in to spin two to three wide into upper stretch, weakened in the drive. PINE VALLEY coaxed from the gate, chased four then three wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, went six wide into upper stretch, tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Famous Gent
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, in hand 2p, ins turn, yielded, 2w 1/4p, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Highly Flammable
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 3-2w, coaxed near 1/4, 3w upper, weakened

ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 4-3w, coaxed 3/8, 6w upper, tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 7 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 76. Maiden Special Weight Purse 75000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ENFUEGA broke in at the start, went to the front, showed the way under pressure to her outside, vied inside on the turn, was roused for more at the quarter-pole, shook clear inside the furlong marker and drew off under steady urging. BOOK OF WISDOM chased the pace on the outside, went three then four wide on the turn, made a bid into the stretch, passed the three-sixteenths on even terms for the lead, battled with the winner into the final furlong and proved no match then narrowly earned the place. LANDED was urged along on the inside of a rival, went five wide on the turn, turned into upper stretch under a drive and just missed the place while able to get the show. TAVIN brushed with a foe at the start, chased the pace on the inside, came off the rail midway through the turn, moved out in upper stretch and weakened. EKWANOK was hustled from the gate then urged along off the pace, went four then three wide on the turn, angled out in upper stretch and failed to rally. GRANADILLA brushed with rivals at the start, moved up to press the pace on the outside, vied in the three path on the turn, turned into upper stretch under a drive, dropped back into the final furlong and tired. DAME CATHERINE was urged along off the pace, rounded the turn in the two path and failed to threaten. FAST AND FRISKY brushed with an opponent at the break, was coaxed along just off the pace, dropped from the two path to the rail on the turn and came up empty. HOLDER CLOSE was urged along at the rear, saved ground on the turn and failed to respond. TSUKIMI was urged along on the outside, dropped in outside the half-mile pole, went two to three wide on the turn and faltered.

ENTRY.COMMENT: urged along, 2path turn, no threat

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 92. Claiming Purse 28000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Maiden And Claiming Races For $8,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Ti me Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ENSIGN PARKER coaxed from the gate, showed the way in hand just off the inside until tucked inside through the turn, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, edged clear to the eighth pole, dug in and held well and clear to the finish to prevail. BOURBON'S HOPE coaxed from the gate, chased five then three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung five wide into upper stretch, ran on to secure the place honors in the final jumps. MISTER J T five paths off the inside down the backstretch, went three wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled six wide into upper stretch and ran on to the finish but was bested in the final jump for the place honors while along safe for the show. NEVER EARLY bobbled at the break, chased along the inside under a ride from the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch, weakened in the late stages. STRIKING SPEED chased four paths off the inside down the backstretch and then just off the inside through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun two to three wide for home and stayed on one paced through to the finish. JOKER BOY bobbled at the start, chased just off the inside coming under coaxing three furlongs from home, swung three to four wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild bid but made no late headway. WINNING DRIVE coaxed from the gate, chased along the inside under a ride from the three-eighths, angled six wide into upper stretch, passed tired rivals. COUSIN ANDREW coaxed from the start, chased six paths off the inside down the backstretch and then three wide through the turn, went four to five wide into upper stretch and offered no response. GANDY DANCING coaxed from the gate, chased six to seven wide down the backstretch and then four wide through the turn, tipped out seven wide at the head of the stretch, weakened. DEE BO chased two to three wide until tucked inside into the turn, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, continued in the inside route into upper stretch and weakened.

ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled st, chased ins, coaxed 5/16, 3w upper, wknd late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 9 6F Dirt CR: 102. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 85000. OUTER TURF FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $45,000. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $45,000 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Tim e Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (Rail at 24 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WIN FOR GOLD went to the front, showed the way with a clear advantage, went around the turn in the two path, responded well when asked for his best in upper stretch and proved best under steady urging. DISARMED lost his footing at the start but broke towards the front, chased the pace down the backstretch, went two then three wide on the turn, pursued the winner under a drive into the final furlong and was second best. BRONX BOMBER settled off the pace, was roused four wide on the turn, moved out in upper stretch and lacked the needed response while up for the show. RUNNINGWSCISSORS settled off the pace, went three wide for most of the turn, shifted five wide over heels at the five-sixteenths and failed to rally. BAR FOURTEEN was urged along off the pace, moved in outside the half-mile pole, saved ground on the turn and failed to threaten. ZEEBEAR was urged along off the pace, went three then two wide on the turn and failed to respond. FEATHERS ROAD was reserved towards the rear, went three wide for most of the turn, shifted six wide near the five-sixteenths, moved to the eight path while going around a lugging out foe outside the quarter-pole and was no factor. MAXWELL ESQUIRE was taken up at the start then dropped back, moved from the rail to the two path on the turn, came three wide into the stretch and also was no factor. FOOLISH GHOST was last to commence, raced on the far outside while ridden along, advanced late on the backstretch, went five wide on the turn and capitulated. WINNERS LAUGH chased the pace, dropped back while lugging out from the four path to the seven path on the turn, came out further into upper stretch and faltered then was eased but walked off.

ENTRY.OWNER: Imperio Michael Rodriguez Rudy R and Gurdon Andrew

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 10 1M Dirt CR: 83. Maiden Claiming Purse 47000. (UP TO $8,178 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to r un this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile on the Main Track.) (Rail at 27 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STRAPPED coaxed from the gate, chased five then four wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung five wide into upper stretch, came in at the three-sixteenths brushing with TIMO, then edged away under a drive to prevail. BOLT D'PLATA chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled six to seven wide into upper stretch, ran on to be along well clear of the rest and second best. TIMO chased four to five paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked three wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch taking over brief and narrow command, got headed straightened away and then was brushed at the three-sixteenths before weakening through to the finish. AMERICAN DAY chased four to five wide under coaxing from the half mile pole, swung three wide into upper stretch, weakened. THE ELUSIVE DRWONG chased two to three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, continued two to three wide for home, tired. CONGRUENTE (ARG) coaxed from the start, chased along the inside under coaxing from the three-eighths, swung two to three wide into upper stretch, made no impact. MAGIADORO hustled from the gate, established the front and showed the way lightly coaxed in the two path, tucked inside into the turn, had the rider sense something amiss and was placed to a protective hold midway on the bend, got altered out and eased up before being pulled up just inside the three-sixteenths marker, then was subsequently vanned off.

ENTRY.NAME: Congruente (ARG)
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased ins, coaxed 3/8, 2-3w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Magiadoro
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, coaxed 2p, ins turn, protected, pulled up, vanned off

ENTRY.NAME: The Elusive Drwong
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-2w, coaxed 3/8, 2-3w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Bolt d'Plata
ENTRY.OWNER: R A Hill Stable and Gatsas Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-2w, coaxed 3/8, 6-7w upper, ran on, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Timo
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 4-5w, coaxed 3w 5/16, 4w upper, brushed, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: American Day
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 4-5w, coaxed 1/2p, 3w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Strapped
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 5-4w, coaxed 5/16, 5w upper, edged away
